channel.title: 718 Barrows Effects....Need help adding
channel.description:
So ive been looking for tutorials and stuff everywhere, but I can't seem to find anything on the effects of the barrows armours. I have no idea how the codes should look so it's dificult for me to just addthem in there. Ifanyone could give me some help or point me to the tutorials I can''t find to save myself I would greatly appreciate it.
Thanks in advance!!

item.title: 718 Barrows Effects....Need help adding
item.dc:creator: @kronixz kronikz
item.description:
@kronixz wrote:

Adding onto what grandstinger said after you’ve found that, if someone per say has full guthans on, make a random and when the numbers match it will show the gfx and add the hp the player hit. etc etc for other barrows

or just convert this/refer to this
http://www.rune-server.org/runescape-development/rs2-server/snippets/416136-pi-item-set-effects.html

Read full topic

item.title: 718 Barrows Effects....Need help adding
item.dc:creator: @grandstinger grandstinger
item.description:
@grandstinger wrote:

[quote=“thereaper93, post:1, topic:550830”]So ive been looking for tutorials and stuff everywhere, but I can’t seem to find anything on the effects of the barrows armours.
I have no idea how the codes should look so it’s dificult for me to just addthem in there.
Ifanyone could give me some help or point me to the tutorials I can’'t find to save myself I would greatly appreciate it.

Thanks in advance!![/quote] do you still need help with this?

if so, the impacts of barrows sets will be done within playercombat.java

make a function that finds out if the player is wearing a full set of barrows.

then you can use this to check if the player has the set of barrows on when you need to check it, then you can tell it to give whatever bonus you want it to.

Read full topic
